name: Destroy All Popups
description: All you wanted to do was browse. How were you to know that clicking on freeXXX.UniqueLO.thai.ge.77MALWARE-LAB77.bunny.com would lead to trouble? Now a profusion of pesky popups are attacking your desktop, putting your 2003 thinkPad's CPU in danger. Your mission: hold them off for as long as possible.
